item.description:
Hi everyone!
Sadly I can not go as I have class tonight, but I fully support this as I love Elliot Smith. Fellow group memeber Mitch has agreed to host this event. Contact him at 617-470-2807 AFTER the show for post meetup coffee and chit chat about the movie. Thanks!
Jenn


Sorry for the late notice, but I just discovered this: As part of the Independent Film Festival of Boston, there will be a one-time showing of the documentary "Searching for Elliott Smith," on Monday, 4/26, at Somerville Theatre, at 7:30. I did not even know this film existed (!), but considering that he may well be the greatest songwriter *ever*, let alone in the history of indie rock, I am definitely planning to attend and thought perhaps there'd be interest by other members of this group. Anyone want to join? (No, it's not a concert, and it will surely be more depressing than one :-), but this is a great opportunity to go behind the scenes of the life and death of a genius and legend. I know I've always been intensely curious.)

Further info and ticket purchasing here:

http://iffboston.bsid...
item.how_to_find_us: Call 617-470-2807 after the movie to meetup.
item.name: "Searching for Elliott Smith" documentary -- one-time-only showing!
